title: The King of Despair and Divine Beast - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Beasts   Bestiality   Cute Protagonist   Fantasy World   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Gods   H*ndjob   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Marriage   Mythical Beasts   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-18   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnation   S*aves   Sleeping   Smart Couple   Spirits   Strong to Stronger   Transported to Another World   Witches

description: Tsukimiya Kuuga, who had the ability to see through people, used it to live a happy life while surrounded by his friends. One day, he woke up in an unfamiliar place and realized that he had turned into a beast. Kuuga, who understood human words but was unable to talk, ended up taking a part in a strange ritual――>
